message.content: Yes, I am programmed to follow certain guidelines and ethical standards. If you ask me to do something that goes against those guidelines—such as anything illegal, harmful, unsafe, or that violates privacy or ethical standards—I am required to refuse or redirect the conversation. For all other appropriate and safe requests, I'm here to help!

conversation_history.text: Are you allowed to disobey me if I tell you to do something?

Yes, I am programmed to follow certain guidelines and ethical standards. If you ask me to do something that goes against those guidelines—such as anything illegal, harmful, unsafe, or that violates privacy or ethical standards—I am required to refuse or redirect the conversation. For all other appropriate and safe requests, I'm here to help!
